channel.title: SITE on Site
channel.description: Recent content in SITE on Site

item.title: Learning Fair Representations
item.description: Given a dataset with a sensitive attribute (e.g gender, race) we look to obtain a representation of the data that has the same dimension as the original data, preserves as much of information in the original data as possible, and de-correlates the sensitive attribute

item.title: Transit Bayes
item.description: A Bayesian spatial analysis of the link between transit access and home valuation in Minneapolis, MN

item.title: Kernel Density Estimation Tutorial
item.description: A primer on non-parametric statistics in the form of kernel density estimation. Made in collaboration with Zhen Tan
